text: I m angry at my parents for forcing me to liveI know they love me a lot  but it feels selfish  I m probably the selfish one  They know I m suicidal because I tried to attempt earlier this year  but that wasn t that serious  They are being supportive  I m under mental health services and they re nice but I just want nothing to do with it  I m on medication which my mum administers every morning and evening  It s meant to be a mood stabiliser but it does nothing for me  I don t want to hurt anyone but I just don t feel compatible with life even though I know I have everything to live for  I sound like a brat  but I genuinely feel resentful towards them  It makes me not want to talk to them  because I don t want to say anything hurtful  I m tired of them guilt tripping me any time I try to bring up that I want to die  probably because it just makes them feel bad and helpless  Their response it generally people have it worse than you  it would break them  it s sinful  etc  I get it  they brought me into the world  they have so many hopes and dreams for my happy  successful life  but I just want an out  You could argue that we can t just tap out because we want to  I get that life is beautiful and the future is full of potential  etc  It just all feels like bs  and I feel so detached from  reality   I almost attempted last week with a meticulous plan  sorted out my finances  picked an outfit  wrote my notes  bought presents  Then I spoke to a good friend  without telling them I felt suicidal  while saying my mental goodbyes to my friends and felt a renewed purpose to stay alive  It lasted two days  I keep planning things to live for  so I have to follow through and not disappoint the people involved  I don t want to ruin the holidays or upcoming birthdays by making it sad with my absence  it would be cool to finish my uni project  just to prove I can  There s a good window in April realistically  but then my plan may not work  it has to be in winter if you get my drift
summary: I'm angry at my parents for forcing me to live even though I'm suicidal. I don't want to hurt anyone but I just don't feel compatible with life. I tried to kill myself earlier this year but it wasn't serious. I'm under mental health services' care but I want nothing to do with it. I almost killed myself last week. I want to finish my uni project in April.
cleaned: angry parent force live suicidal not want hurt not feel compatible life try kill early year not mental health service care want kill week want finish uni project april

text: Do you want to die or do you want to stop the pain  Suicide never stops the pain  it just passes it onto someone else who doesn t deserve to feel that way as much as you didn t deserve to feel that way  Even if you think that nobody cares  there will always be people who will care about you but for the ones who don t  just cut them out of your lives because you ve gotta work towards a better future  I know depressions isn t as easy as just  cheering up  but you ve gotta overcome it no matter what  You ve only got one life and it shouldn t be wasted just because of the feelings of self hatred  doubt  loneliness  etc  It s always worse before it gets better so you ve gotta keep it pushing no matter what shit you re going through  If you re a victim of abuse and the abuser is still abusing you  then you ve gotta call the cops  Fuck the feeling of shyness if you get it  A quick conversation with the operator is an incredible investment to stop it from happening ever again from that person  Also  you ll find the right people eventually  Take care of yourselves  I know you have the strength to get through whatever you re dealing with no matter how doubtful that may be to you  I also urge to see a therapist or talk to a mental health hotline no matter how shy you may be  Just apply the same investment logic to it  There are probably more ways of dealing with this  but this helps me with similar things  Not with talking to people on the phone about my issues  but with normal everyday life  because I have Social Anxiety Disorder  so I know how much of a struggle life can be  Again  please take care of yourselves  I know it s easier said than done  but you ve gotta make an effort  Love you
summary: Suicide is not a solution to depression. If you are a victim of abuse and the abuser is still abusing you, you should call the cops. You should see a therapist or talk to a mental health hotline no matter how shy you are.
cleaned: suicide not solution depression victim abuse abuser abuse cop therapist talk mental health hotline no matter shy

text: Two Cents From A StrangerAs the title says  this is just my two cents on all of you here  I know that you are depressed  broken  feel utterly worthless  and as if nobody loves you or cares about you  Yet despite all of that  here you are  still alive  You have stared down the darkness of the abyss  witnessed its horrors and lived them  yet despite that you still stand  And that is just absolutely incredible  I mean do you realize the kind of strength it takes to do something like that  You face nightmares of unimaginable horror  every single day  but you choose to keep pushing along  If I were in your situation right now I would opt out  and I bet many others would agree  Yet here you stand  covered in scars  blisters  and other wounds  continuing to march on forward  I hope that someday  even if it isn t today  you realize how amazing you are to be able to do that  The fact alone that you are even able to get out of the bed in the morning is a testament to your strength  Seriously  y all have a strength greater than that of even the worlds strongest person or the most brilliant human to ever live  because you keep on pushing on  I m so dang proud of you  So gosh dang it I wish you the absolute best  and I hope that your day becomes even a tad bit better than it was  Keep being amazing  you are a shining example  From  a stranger on the Internet
summary: Two cents from a stranger is a message of support for depressed people on the Internet. He wishes them the best and hopes they realize how amazing they are to be able to keep on living despite the terrible things they have been through.

text: How to kill myself without leaving my family with the bill Hey y all  been researching suicide lately  not a big deal  just that my life has been kinda  worst case scenario  for a while and some family financial issues have pushed it well past that  and the most troubling thing for me is worrying about funerary clean up costs that my family would be stuck with on my departure  If I have to head out I d rather my choice be a net financial gain for my family so I d really appreciate some tips on what kind of funerary arrangements to specify  knowing to what extent a suicide note is legally binding as a will would also be wonderful  and any info on how to dodge a postmortem cleaning bill  Obvious choice would be to drive out to the woods or throw myself off a bridge or something but I can t drive and I m stuck in the burbs so any choice is gonna be a bit of a hassle  unfortunately Sorry if this isn t the right place for this  and thanks in advance

text: Depressed forever  finally over the brinkSo I recently graduated college  Something I only did because my parents wanted me to  And they said they would pay for it  I got an academic scholarship to a top   school  but instead went to a top   school because my parents wanted me to  I got some aid  but over the course   years I accumulated  K in student loans   Now my parents are saying they will not pay for it  I know it sounds selfish and greedy of me  but if it wasn t for their forcing me to go to a better school and telling me that they would pay for it  I would have made different decisions  I probably wouldn t have even gone to college because I hated every minute of it  or I would have just gone to the other college for free   My only motivation for the last   years was that I would get a job  biomedical engineering  and be able to be somewhat free  In school you are never free because there is always an assignment to be completed  But when you have a job  you are basically free on the hours you are not working I would rather die than pay for this education I never wanted  I ve never liked school  elementary  middle  high school  college  and now it s officially taken the best years of my youth and wants to take the rest of my adulthood through debt   I wish I had a better reason to kill myself  but I feel like my past has been wasted and my future is ruined
summary: I got an academic scholarship to a top college, but I accumulated K in student loans. Now my parents refuse to pay for it. I would rather die than pay for this education I never wanted. I wish I had a better reason to kill myself.
cleaned: get academic scholarship college accumulate student loan parent refuse pay die pay education want wish well reason kill
